content: Jan 27 The following corporate finance-related stories were reported by media:
name: CommScope Holding Company Inc
title: REFILE-Market Chatter- Corporate finance press digest

content: Swiss electronics company TE Connectivity Ltd is said to be nearing a deal to sell its network equipment unit to CommScope Holding Co Inc for about $3 billion  the Wall Street Journal reported  citing people familiar with the matter.
name: CommScope Holding Company Inc
title: TE Connectivity nears deal to sell network business to CommScope: WSJ

content: Telecom equipment maker CommScope Holding Co Inc  said it would buy nearly all of Swiss electronics firm TE Connectivity's  network gear business for about $3 billion to expand in Europe and Asia.
name: CommScope Holding Company Inc
title: CommScope to buy most of TE Connectivity's network business

content: Jan 26 Swiss electronics company TE Connectivity Ltd is said to be nearing a deal to sell its network equipment unit to CommScope Holding Co Inc for about $3 billion  the Wall Street Journal reported  citing people familiar with the matter.
name: CommScope Holding Company Inc
title: TE Connectivity nears deal to sell network business to CommScope -WSJ

content: Jan 28 Telecom equipment maker CommScope Holding Co Inc said it would buy nearly all of Swiss electronics firm TE Connectivity's network gear business for about $3 billion to expand in Europe and Asia.
name: CommScope Holding Company Inc
title: UPDATE 1-CommScope to buy most of TE Connectivity's network business

content: Jan 28 Telecom equipment maker CommScope Holding Co Inc said it will buy Swiss electronics firm TE Connectivity's network equipment business for about $3 billion in cash to expand in Europe and Asia.
name: CommScope Holding Company Inc
title: CommScope to buy TE Connectivity's network business for $3 bln
